001package com.technototes.library.util;
002
003/** Class with various math functions
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006public class MathUtils {
007    /** Get the max of supplied doubles
008     *
009     * @param args The doubles
010     * @return The max
011     */
012    public static double getMax(double... args) {
013        double max = args[0];
014        for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
015            max = Math.max(max, args[i]);
016        }
017        return max;
018    }
019    /** Get the max of supplied ints
020     *
021     * @param args The ints
022     * @return The max
023     */
024    public static int getMax(int... args) {
025        int max = 0;
026        for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {
027            max = Math.max(args[i - 1], args[i]);
028        }
029        return max;
030    }
031
032    /** Calculate pythagorean theorem of any number of sides
033     *
034     * @param vals The sides
035     * @return The hypotenuse
036     */
037    public static double pythag(double... vals) {
038        double total = 0;
039        for (double d : vals) {
040            total += d * d;
041        }
042        return Math.sqrt(total);
043    }
044
045    /** Constrain the supplied int
046     *
047     * @param min The minimum of the constraint
048     * @param num The number to constrain
049     * @param max The maximum of the constraint
050     * @return The constrained number
051     */
052    public static int constrain(int min, int num, int max) {
053        return num < min ? min : (num > max ? max : num);
054    }
055    /** Constrain the supplied double
056     *
057     * @param min The minimum of the constraint
058     * @param num The number to constrain
059     * @param max The maximum of the constraint
060     * @return The constrained number
061     */
062    public static double constrain(double min, double num, double max) {
063        return num < min ? min : (num > max ? max : num);
064    }
065
066    /** Calculate if the supplied number is prime
067     *
068     * @param number The number to check
069     * @return If number is prime
070     */
071    public static boolean isPrime(int number) {
072        for (int i = 2; i <= number / 2; i++) {
073            if (number % i == 0) {
074                return false;
075            }
076        }
077        return true;
078    }
079
080    public static double map(double x, double in_min, double in_max, double out_min, double out_max) {
081        return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
082    }
083
084    public static double closestTo(double d, double... values) {
085        int lowestDif = 0;
086        for (int i = 1; i < values.length; i++) {
087            if (Math.abs(values[lowestDif] - d) > Math.abs(values[i] - d)) lowestDif = i;
088        }
089        return values[lowestDif];
090    }
091
092    public static int closestTo(double d, int... values) {
093        int lowestDif = 0;
094        for (int i = 1; i < values.length; i++) {
095            if (Math.abs(values[lowestDif] - d) > Math.abs(values[i] - d)) lowestDif = i;
096        }
097        return values[lowestDif];
098    }
099}
